div.h2: Welcome to Columbus Community School District

p.style: margin: 0.5em 0px 0.9em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: left;
p.span: Mission: To inspire every learner to excel.

p.style: margin: 0.5em 0px 0.9em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: left;

span.span: Columbus Community School District will create learners ready for intellectual work and contributions to a global community.

a.title: Instructions on how to access a teacher's webpages.

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium; margin-bottom: 12pt; text-align: center;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: 22px; font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
p.span: Our schools will remain closed until further notice. All doors and buildings are secured. We want to remind everyone that if we work together as a community, we will be okay. Please continue to be patient with one another and practice social distancing guidelines. Please ensure that you do not gather in groups larger than 10 and you only gather in groups that you are sheltered with. If you experience flu-like symptoms, loss of taste, low fever, etc.; quarantine yourself for at least one week. We will update everyone through school messenger, our district Facebook page and this page as we receive more information.

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium; margin-bottom: 12pt;
p.span: Grab & Go sack meals for children under 18 years of age will be at the following locations on Mondays, Wednesdays & Fridays. Each sack will contain breakfast and lunch meal items and milk for two days with the exception of Friday. Please be patience as we work through figuring out the estimated number of prepared meals to provide at each location. In the event that we run out of meals we will make a second delivery. In an effort to comply with social distancing these meals must be taken home and eaten. Questions may be directed to Tammy Mapel (319) 728-2911 ext. 9092 or Tashia Wheeler (319) 728-9106.

ul.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 0in;

li.span: Double Door South Entrance High School- 8:30 AM-10:30 AM
Masonic Lodge, Columbus City- 9:00 AM-9:20 AM

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium; margin-bottom: 11.25pt;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
span.br: Thank you for your patience and support during this time.

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium; margin-bottom: 12pt; text-align: center;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: 22px; font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
p.span: Nuestras escuelas permanecerán cerradas hasta nuevo aviso”. Todas las puertas y edificios están seguros. Queremos recordarles a todos que si trabajamos juntos como una comunidad, estaremos bien. Por favor continúe siendo paciente el uno con el otro y practicando las normas de distanciamiento social. Por favor asegúrese de no reunirse en grupos de más de diez y nada más reúnase en grupos con los cuales se siente protegido. “Si siente síntomas de gripa , perdida de sabor, un poco de fiebre, etc.; manténgase en cuarentena por lo menos una semana. Les estaremos comunicando a todos por el sistema de mensajes de la escuela, nuestra página de Facebook y por esta página a según recibamos más información.

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: medium;
p.span: Las comidas con sacos Grab & Go para niños menores de 18 años se realizarán en los siguientes lugares los lunes, miércoles y viernes. Cada saco contendrá alimentos para el desayuno y el almuerzo y leche durante dos días, con la excepción del viernes. Tenga paciencia mientras trabajamos para calcular la cantidad estimada de comidas preparadas para proporcionar en cada ubicación. En caso de que se nos acaben las comidas, haremos una segunda entrega. En un esfuerzo por cumplir con el distanciamiento social, estas comidas deben llevarse a casa y comerse. Las preguntas pueden dirigirse a Tammy Mapel (319) 728-2911 ext. 9092 o Tashia Wheeler (319) 728-9106.

ul.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 0in;

li.span: Escuela Secundaria de Doble Puerta de Entrada Sur- 8:30 AM-10: 30 AM
Masonic Lodge, Columbus City- 9:00 AM-9: 20 AM

p.style: margin-bottom: 12pt; text-align: left;

span.span: Gracias por su paciencia y apoyo durante este tiempo.

strong.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: 22px; text-align: center;

p.style: margin-bottom: 11.25pt; font-size: medium; text-align: center;
font-size: medium; text-align: left;
p.span: Theihternak dang um hlan lo kan sianginn cu khar rih a si lai. Inn ka lut nak vialte cu khar an si. Theihter tthan kan in duh mi hna cu community in kan ttuan tti hna ah cun kan him ko lai. Zaangfah nak tein pakhat khat lungsau te in im cio hna usih cun hlat khoh chung um zong tuah peng rih hna usih. Minung nak 10 tam lo um tti hrial hram uh zaangfah tein cun na um tti mi hna he lawng um peng ko inn khat ah. Tlangrai,ka thawt lo,khawsih tibantuk na neih ah cun zarhkhat chung tel nangmah te lawng um ta. Sianginn ca kuatnak in thawng kan thanh peng lai, cun kan Facebook page ah le dang dang theihternak hna ah thawng thanh kan i zuam lai.

p.style: font-size: medium; text-align: left;
margin-bottom: 11.25pt; font-size: medium; text-align: left;
margin-bottom: 11.25pt; font-size: medium; text-align: left;
p.span: Lak I kal cawlh rawl kum 18 tang ngakchia caah tuah piak mi cu Nikhat ni,Nithum ni,le Ninga ni a tanglei hmunhma langhter mi ah hin va lak khoh a si lai. Breakfast le chuncaw an um lai sawngkhoi kip ah cun nihnih caah cawhnuk zong um chih lai Ninga ni tiang caah. Zaangfah tein lungsau in um ko hmunkip ah rawl pek le chiah ding kan itimh nak ah le minung pazei zat caah a si lai ti kan zoh lio ah. Rawl phawt lio ah rawl a dih a si ah cun kan rak put tthan lai. Minung sin in hlat khoh chung um I timh nak ah rawl cu inn ah lawipi in inn ah ei ding a si lai. Biahal duh mi neih a si ah cun (319)728-2911 ext.9092 ah chonh ding a si lai silo le Tashia Wheeler (319)728-9106 ah.

span.style: padding: 0in; font-size: 14pt; border: 1pt none windowtext; font-family: "Helvetica Neue";

li.span: Double Door South Entrance High School- 8:30 AM-10:30 AM
Masonic Lodge, Columbus City- 9:00 AM-9:20 AM

p.style: margin-bottom: 11.25pt; font-size: medium; text-align: left;

span.br: Na lungsaunak cung ah le na kan bawmhnak cung ah kan ilawm.

font-family: latobold; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: var(--themePrimary); font-size: 21px;;color: rgb(0, 112, 192);
span.a: Department of Education - Iowa School Performance Profiles

br.br: Under state and federal law, Iowa is required to publish report cards reflecting every public school’s performance on multiple measures. These Iowa School Performance Profiles help stakeholders understand how their schools are serving students, as well as identify those schools that require support and improvements provided by the state. Report cards and designations were recently released to the public.

p.style: color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: padding: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; border: 0px; font-size: 18px;

p.span: This year, Columbus Community School District is proud to celebrate their performance in all three schools:

p.style: color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: padding: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; border: 0px; font-size: 18px;

p.span: No schools in the district require targeted support or improvement at the state level. This is great news! Congratulations to the students, staff, and community on these achievements!

p.style: color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: padding: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: 18px; color: black;

p.span: To view the data and information provided on the Iowa School Performance Profiles, please use the link below.

br.a: Department of Education - Iowa School Performance Profiles

div.style: font-size: 14px; max-height: 100px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: wf_segoe-ui_normal, "Segoe UI", "Segoe WP", Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; margin-bottom: 12px; margin-right: 8px; overflow: hidden;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(166, 166, 166); font-family: wf_segoe-ui_normal, "Segoe UI", "Segoe WP", Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Iowa immunization rules have changed for next year and the vaccine for meningitis is now required for next year's 7th graders and Seniors. 7th graders are required to have a Tdap (tetanus,

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: and pertussis) booster and the meningococcal vaccine. Seniors are required to have a

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: after they have turned 16 years of age. Iowa immunization code does not allow school attendance if the meningococcal vaccine has not been received.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latobold, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Your child will not be able to attend school next year unless this requirement has been met.

p.style: text-align: center;
text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal; margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; orphans: 2; widows: 2; font-variant-ligatures: normal;

p.style: text-align: center; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; orphans: 2; widows: 2; font-variant-ligatures: normal;

div.p: It is the policy of the Columbus Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, creed, national origin, religion, sex, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, political party affiliation, socioeconomic status, or marital status in its programs, activities, or employment practices as required by the Iowa Code. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have any questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district's Equity Coordinator, Mr. Kyle Reeve, Elementary Principal, 1212 Colton Street, Columbus Junction, IA 52738, 319-728-6218 ext. 1090, kyle.reeve@columbuscsd.org.
